A

Account - Class in homework1
A class that represents a user account on this social media platform program.
Account(int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class homework1.Account
Creates a new account with the specified values for username, birth date, and location.
AccountID - Variable in class homework1.Post
The ID of the account that shared the post.
